thread.title: See Photos of Stars Celebrating at the Grammys After-Party 2017
thread.title_full: See Photos of Stars Celebrating at the Grammys After-Party 2017

author: Lori Keong
title: See Photos of Stars Celebrating at the Grammys After-Party 2017
text:
view gallery 15 Photos 
After all the accolades, the grand performances, the broken hearts , and the lofty acceptance speeches comes the most fun to be had at the Grammys: the after-party. Ahead, pics from the post-show celebration, where stars got to finally kick off their heels (or dress shoes) and let loose. More
